author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Victoria’s Secret Arrives at Denver International AirportTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Victoria’s Secret Arrives at Denver International Airport  
Victoria’s Secret is now open on the B Concourse at Denver International Airport (DEN).
 
The Victoria’s Secret Beauty and Accessories Store is located on the B Concourse Mezzanine level. The store features an iconic, fashion-forward range of beauty products and accessories designed for the modern jet-setter. Beauty shoppers will find the brand’s best-selling fine fragrances; travel-ready items such as signature lip gloss and body-care products; a
unique collection of luxury accessories that includes cosmetic cases, bags, small leather goods and luggage; so-soft scarves; sunglasses and a range of panties to complete the assortment.
 
Victoria’s Secret features a dynamic storefront with an interior that features upscale elements like black-cherry fixtures eye-catching focal walls surrounding the 796-square-foot space, and a video wall that broadcasts footage of the Victoria’s Secret Angels. The store is open daily from 8 a.m. to 9 p.m.
 
“The addition of Victoria’s Secret at Denver International Airport will provide another globally-recognized brand that further enhances the retail shopping options for more than 53 million travelers each year,” said Bhavesh Patel, DEN’s Chief Revenue Officer.
 
Source:- Denver International Airport
